newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Zaire's Mobutu arrives in Morocco.
newsitem.headline: Zaire's Mobutu arrives in Morocco.

text.p: Zaire's ousted president Mobutu Sese Seko arrived in Morocco on Friday from Lome on board the presidential plane of Togolese president Gnassingbe Eyadema, an airport official said.
Mobutu, supported by aides, walked slowly and got into a black limousine after disembarking from the Boeing 707, the official said. He gave no other details.
The official said Mobutu was accompanied by members of his family.
Reporters were barred from approaching the airport.
Reuters reporters saw the black limousine and two buses leaving the airport for an unknown destination.
Mobutu, who is fighting cancer, arrived in Lome from his jungle palace at Gbadolite in northern Zaire on Sunday, a day after Laurent Kabila's rebels marched into Kinshasa.
